name: User Entity
description: The user entity object represents a real user in an organizational network environment.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the user entity.

domain.description: The domain where the user is defined. For example: the LDAP or Active Directory domain.

end_time.name: End Date
end_time.description: The end or termination date of the user.

groups.description: The groups to which the user belongs.

labels.description: The list of labels attached to the user.

location.description: The geographical location of the user's office.

org_unit.description: The name of the org unit to which the user belongs.

priority.description: The original priority assigned to the user.

priority_id.description: The normalized priority identifier assigned to the user. The priority is useful for calculating the urgency for alerts or incidents.

provider.description: The source or the provider of the user data.

ref_uid.description: The reference to a unique identifier, managed by an external system. For example LDAP distinguished name of the user.

start_time.name: Start Date
start_time.description: The start or hire date of the user.

title.description: The job title of the person.
